Replace.Text: The "Writing" technology is unlocked at the beginning of the game. +1% [ICON_Science] Science and 1 [ICON_InfluencePerTurn] Influence from each Manalia Library. Join the Manalia Magic Academy Association in the game, and association members will bring various bonuses to Manalia.
Origin of magic
Manalia

Units gain +1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength from each overlord city-state or member of the Manalia Academy of Magic who owns the "Manalia Library", + +1 to the member of the Manalia Academy of Magic who owns the "Manalia Library" 10 Diplomatic relations
I will protect everyone in Manalia
install
Manalia College

Manalia's characteristic technology area. Alternative Academy. +10% [ICON_Production] productivity for constructing the area and its buildings for each overlord city-state or member of the Manalia Academy of Magic who owns the "Manalia Library". The [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist, [ICON_GreatGeneral] great general, [ICON_GreatEngineer] great engineer +5 [ICON_Science] technology, [ICON_GreatMerchant] great merchant, [ICON_GreatAdmiral] naval commander +10 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, [ICON_GreatWriter] great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician +5 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Manalia Library

Manalia's characteristic architecture. Military units trained for the city receive a random ability from "Manalia Defense Formation" and "Manalia Magic Bullet" for each suzerain city-state or Manali that owns "Manalia Library" Member of the Academy of Sub-Magic, +1 [ICON_Science] Science
+10 technology, +2 diplomatic support, +2 influence when located in the academy
Manalia Defense Formation: +6 combat power when defending
Manalia Magic Bullet: +3 combat power
+10 gold coins when located in the academy
+5 technology when located in the academy
+5 culture when located in a college
Manalia Defense +6
Manalia Magic Bullet +3
+{1_Amount} from Manalia
Manalia
Manalia
Manalia Academy of Magic
Manalia Academy of Magic
O people who gather in my name. Be diligent and move forward. No matter when, magic will be with you──
I will give humans the eyes to see clearly the torrent of magic. Then give humans the ears to hear the sound of magic. Finally, I will give humans a mind that sublimates magic power into magic──
O people who gather in my name. Be diligent and move forward. No matter when, magic will be with you──
Manalia Academy of Magic
Knowledge of Manalia

Unlocked after sending envoys to the city-state, +200% [ICON_Production] productivity when building the first academy area, allowing the construction of a powerful alternative to "Library": "Manalia Library", which is equivalent to owning "Manalia Library" +10 Diplomatic Relations for members of Manalia Academy of Magic
manalia party
Unlocked in the Middle Ages. +1 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Support, +1 [ICON_InfluencePerTurn] Influence for each member of Manalia Academy of Magic who owns the Manalia Library
Manalia's Wisdom
Unlocked in the Industrial Age. +10 [ICON_Science] Science, +2 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Support, +2 [ICON_InfluencePerTurn] Influence for each Great Scientist and Writer located in the Academy area
Great Study of Manalia
Unlocked during the Atomic Age. Gain 2 random free technologies, plus 2 more for each Manalia Academy of Magic member who owns the "Manalia Library"
Member of Manalia Academy of Magic
Member of Manalia Academy of Magic
Let you see my true strength!
princess manalia
Prefers civilizations willing to build long-term alliances. Hates civilizations that condemn or attack their friends or allies.
I want to use this power——for everyone and for this college. Therefore, I will no longer show mercy. Let you see my true strength!
(Ann likes to announce friendly)
Ann likes to announce friendly
(Ann hates it when you condemn his friends)
Ann hates it when you condemn his friends
(I will protect everyone in Manalia)
I will protect everyone in Manalia
I will give humans the eyes to see clearly the torrent of magic. Then give humans the ears to hear the sound of magic. Finally, I will give humans a mind that sublimates magic power into magic──
O people who gather in my name. Be diligent and move forward. No matter when, magic will be with you──
"Magic books are actually just like students...some are very quiet, and some are very naughty!" - Dark magic teacher Heline
install
install

The daughter of the current king and a student of the great magical genius. She showed extraordinary talent and left the palace to knock on the door of the school. The noble blood flowing in the princess conquered everything. It fascinates not only people, but also the spirits and demons who answer her call.
An can receive bonuses from the overlord city-state and members of the Manalia Academy of Magic
The suzerain city-state protects the members of Manalia Magic Academy
Hello, welcome to Manalia, I'm Ann.
Take a good look at my magic!
This magic is for everyone to use!
The college is indeed a great place. I'm glad you like it here too.
Heroic spirits, defeat my enemies!

welcome

certainly!

Do you allow our troops to cross your territory?
Want to scare us with the army? I'm afraid it will backfire.
I must say, I'm a little disappointed.
Yes, this is a good thing.
